entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 March 2023
